CHAT.comment: STATE OF NEW HAMPSHIRE, Plaintiff v. STATE OF MAINE
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States as 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY P. MINEAR FOR UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING DEFENDANT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LESLIE J. LUDTKE
(Whereupon at 1:59 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
